arts.ttl: Arne Slot shares Andy Robertson injury latest after new Liverpool fitness scare
arts.sum: The left-back was taken off late on against Wolves after suffering a heel problem

arts.ttl: Wolves 1-2 Liverpool: Player ratings as Reds secure spot at the top of the table
arts.sum: It was the hosts who looked most likely to steal an early effort, firing optimistic chances towards Alisson on his return to action. CM: Mario Lemina - 4/10 - Had a solid start to the game but ruined his efforts after allowing the ball to fall to Mohamed Salah - who just missed the chance to make it 2-0 after the break .

arts.ttl: 'It's got to stop' - Neville slams Wolves' tactics in Liverpool defeat
arts.sum: Gary Neville slammed Wolves' approach in the final stages of their 2-1 defeat to Liverpool at Molineux on Saturday Night Football, suggesting they had "lost the essence of football."

arts.ttl: Wolves misery continues as Salah fires Liverpool top
arts.sum: Highlights from the Premier League clash between Wolves and Liverpool.

arts.ttl: Liverpool boss reacts to huge Konate error following Wolves win
arts.sum: Liverpool manager Arne Slot believes Wolves’ goal was entirely “avoidable” after Ibrahima Konate made an error that led directly to it. The Reds ultimately ran out 2-1 winners at Molineux on Saturday thanks to Mo Salah’s penalty. Konate had opened the scoring in first-half stoppage time, but the Frenchman dallied on the ball in the […] The post Liverpool boss reacts to huge Konate error following Wolves win first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Arne Slot provides Andy Robertson Liverpool injury update after Wolves blow
arts.sum: Liverpool manager Arne Slot issues an update on Andy Robertson's injury following the Reds' 2-1 victory over Wolverhampton Wanderers in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: Ibrahima Konate jokes that HE should have won Man of the Match - and not Ryan Gravenberch - after Liverpool's 2-1 win over Wolves… before Arne Slot hilariously points out the main reason why the French defender didn't!
arts.sum: After being the hero for his side Konate would find himself the villain early in the second half after a clumsy defensive mixup allowed Rayan Ait-Nouri to equalise.

arts.ttl: 'The group is fighting and giving everything’
arts.sum: The loss meant Wolves remain on one point for the season but received a positive reception from supporters after the match, which the head coach believes shows there’s no need to panic. “But that is a group, and as you can see by the reaction of the fans at the end, that is fighting it and giving everything, and can play some good stuff.

arts.ttl: Wolves 1-2 Liverpool: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Reds top the table
arts.sum: Liverpool go to the top of the Premier League after defeating winless Wolves at Molineux.

arts.ttl: Wolves 1-2 Liverpool PLAYER RATINGS: Which player stood out for the Reds? Who will feel like they could have done more for Arne Slot's side? And who was 'comfortably outpointed' in the middle of the park for the hosts?
arts.sum: DOMINIC KING AT THE MOLINEUX: Liverpool have jumped to the top of the Premier League despite a far from convincing display as they beat bottom of the table Wolves 2-1.
